survey_name: Corporate Learning and Development Effectiveness Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of corporate learning and development programs, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to enhance employee skills and organizational performance.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in corporate learning and development programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in corporate learning and development programs?

questions.question_text: Which types of learning and development programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), include an open-text field for 'Other' option.

script.question_text: Which types of learning and development programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How relevant are the learning and development programs to your current role?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Consider a Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How relevant are the learning and development programs to your current role?

questions.question_text: What is your overall satisfaction with the quality of the learning and development programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: What is your overall satisfaction with the quality of the learning and development programs?

questions.question_text: How effective are the learning and development programs in improving your job performance?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is intuitive.

script.question_text: How effective are the learning and development programs in improving your job performance?

questions.question_text: What barriers do you face in participating in learning and development programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time due to workload
Programs not relevant to my role
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE), include an open-text field for 'Other' option.

script.question_text: What barriers do you face in participating in learning and development programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of time due to workload
Programs not relevant to my role

questions.question_text: How supportive is your manager in encouraging your participation in learning and development programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How supportive is your manager in encouraging your participation in learning and development programs?

questions.question_text: What topics or skills would you like to see covered in future learning and development programs?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow free-form responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What topics or skills would you like to see covered in future learning and development programs?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's learning and development programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. This is a standard NPS-style question.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's learning and development programs to a colleague?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions regarding the company's learning and development programs?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow free-form responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions regarding the company's learning and development programs?
